Package acme.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Assert
    Routines to assert conditions are true, to fail, and to panic.
    AtomicFlag
    A simple thread-safe flag implementation.
    Debug
    Various routines to print debugging messages, depending on whether a key is enable with the "-d" command line option.
    LockManager
    An array of locks that can be used for locks.
    ResourceManager<K,V>
    A generic, threadsafe lookup table that knows how to allocate an entry for a key that has not been looked up before.
    ResourceMap<T>
    An extensibe array for mapping integers to numbered resources.
    StackDump
    Methods for printring or returning a String representing the stack of a thread, excluding library entries.
    StringMatcher
    A general pattern matcher that can accept, reject, or do nothing.
    Strings
    A set of String library static methods.
    Util
    Various utility routines.
    Yikes
    Routines to print "yikes" messages -- unusual internal circumstances that are worth noting but don't cause failure.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    StringMatchResult
